message.content:
cs.AR, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.PL

This paper deals with hardware-software codesign in the domain of machine learning inference workloads and accelerators. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.AR (Hardware Architecture), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), as machine learning is a subfield of AI. The paper also involves the use of equality graphs, which are a data structure from the compilers literature, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) a likely category as well. Additionally, the paper proposes a new language for representing machine learning hardware and software in a single program, which falls under the category of cs.PL (Programming Languages). Finally, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a possible category, as the paper deals with machine learning inference workloads.
